select
from user_file a left join file_info b on a.file_id=b.id left join file_type c on b.type_id=c.id where a.del=#{del} and b.id=#{id}
select a.md5,a.id from file_info a where md5=#{md5}

select
from user_file a left join file_info b on a.file_id=b.id left join file_type c on b.type_id=c.id where a.del=#{del} and a.username=#{username} order by a.upload_date desc
